cards.name: (Stage) Maya Yamato
cards.skname: Even if you read from below...?
cards.skill: Turns Great+ notes into Perfect notes, and boosts score by +10% for 5, up to 8 seconds.

cards.name: (Encounter with Drums) Maya Yamato
cards.skill: Restores 200, up to 300 life, and boosts score by +10% for 5, up to 8 seconds.
cards.origin: Event: The Path that we Traveled, and the Future Taking Color (31 May 2017)

cards.name: (Supporting the Two) Maya Yamato
cards.skill: Boosts score by +30% for 5, up to 7 seconds.
cards.origin: Gacha: Sonata of Blue and Crimson (31 August 2017)
